Again, I thank Representative Foster for his leadership on promoting  financial stability. I also appreciate the way he improved this bill,  which I will support, and I yield back the balance of my time.

Mr. Speaker, I urge my colleagues to support this bill that is not  only happening quickly but, I will also note, is happening with  bipartisan support. I yield back the balance of my time.

Mr. Speaker, I thank Representative Messmer for bringing this bill  before us. I encourage my colleagues to support it, and I yield back  the balance of my time.
